author: DENNIS PASSA
title: John Landy, pursuer of Bannister's 4-minute mile, dies at 91
description: John Landy, an Australian runner who dueled with Roger Bannister to be the first person to run a four-minute mile, has died. He was 91.Landy's family on Saturday said the former athlete, who also became governor of Australia's Victoria state, had died at his …
